alert.note: Alert for Bryan (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 05 at 1:01PM CDT until May 05 at 1:45PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Bryan County in southeastern Oklahoma... * Until 145 PM CDT. * At 100 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 4 miles northeast of Ravenna, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. * Locations impacted include... Bennington and Wade. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
